abstract: Sun Microsystems has canceled its Rock chip project after years of funding and toil, according to two people briefed on the matter.
snippet: Sun Microsystems has canceled its Rock chip project after years of funding and toil, according to two people briefed on the matter.
lead_paragraph: Sun Microsystems may have dropped a bit of weight by the time Oracle officially acquires the company. According to two people briefed on Sun’s plans, the company has canceled its Rock chip project, putting an end to one of its biggest revitalization bets.

headline.main: Sun Is Said to Cancel Big Chip Project
